product_name: Showers Pass Club Convertible 2 Bike Pants - Women's
long_description: A commuter's best friend, the breathable Showers Pass Club Convertible 2 women's bike pants seal out the weather. They convert to knickers when the sun pops out on your ride home. Lightweight fabric features a waterproof, breathable laminate for durable protection; fully taped seams prevent water penetration. Zip-off lower legs convert pants to knickers. Articulated knees encourage full range of motion. Large side pockets with water-resistant zippers securely stash a few items, such as ID and cash. Ankle zippers offer easy on/off over bike shoes. Dual leg straps keep pant legs away from chain and crank, boosting the shelf life of your Showers Pass Club Convertible 2 pants. Boost your nighttime visibility with an abundance of reflective taping.
short_description: A commuter's best friend, the breathable Showers Pass Club Convertible 2 women's bike pants seal out the weather. They convert to knickers when the sun pops out on your ride home.
